Eventd (Event Daemon)Â¶

Eventd (or Event Daemon) is synchronous service which registers event types and handlers then triggers those handlers when notified of a matching event. Primarily used by the WebSocketApp to trigger server side processing of client events from WebSocket connections.

This is a horizontally scalable service.
